data.name: WWE 2K22 - MyRISE Mega-Boost
data.detailed_description:
START YOUR CAREER. FINISH THE COMPETITION.

Make your debut in WWE 2K22 unstoppable with the MyRISE Mega-Boost. Unlock and upgrade your MyPLAYER ratings and attributes with 200 additional Attribute Points.


The MyRISE Mega-Boost is also available as part of the Season Pass, which comes included in the WWE 2K22 Deluxe Edition and WWE 2K22 nWo 4-Life Edition.
data.about_the_game:
START YOUR CAREER. FINISH THE COMPETITION.

Make your debut in WWE 2K22 unstoppable with the MyRISE Mega-Boost. Unlock and upgrade your MyPLAYER ratings and attributes with 200 additional Attribute Points.


The MyRISE Mega-Boost is also available as part of the Season Pass, which comes included in the WWE 2K22 Deluxe Edition and WWE 2K22 nWo 4-Life Edition.
data.short_description: START YOUR CAREER. FINISH THE COMPETITION.  Make your debut in WWE 2K22 unstoppable with the MyRISE Mega-Boost. Unlock and upgrade your MyPLAYER ratings and attributes with 200 additional Attribute Points.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3550 / AMD FX 8150 (AVX - Compatible processor)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: At least 4 GB Video Memory
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-4790 / AMD FX 8350 (AVX - Compatible processor)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1070 / Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: At least 6 GB Video Memory
